entity:AbyssalCall.NAME: Abyssal Call
entity:AbyssalCall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Add !M! *Void into your discard pile.
entity:AbyssalCall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself. Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

entity:CosmicRay.NAME: Cosmic Ray
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Void into your discard pile.

entity:Coup.NAME: Coup
entity:Coup.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw a card for each unique cost in your hand.
entity:Coup.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself. Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

entity:Grasp.NAME: Grasp
entity:Grasp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

entity:Lash.NAME: Lash
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Void into your discard pile.

entity:Sap.NAME: Sap
entity:Sap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Gain !entity:E! entity:Essence. NL Exhaust.

entity:Tear.NAME: Tear
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Exhaust a card in your discard pile.

entity:TentacleRage.NAME: Tentacle Rage
entity:TentacleRage.DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage to a random enemy !M! times.

entity:UncoilingTendrils.NAME: Uncoiling Tendrils
entity:UncoilingTendrils.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, Transform a common card in your deck. NL Exhaust.

entity:VoidBlast.NAME: Void Blast
entity:VoidBlast.DESCRIPTION: Apply !entity:S! Vulnerable to yourself. Deal !D! damage !entity:M! times. Apply !M! Vulnerable to that target.

entity:Anomaly.NAME: Anomaly
entity:Anomaly.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity and 1 Strength for each card played this turn after this. NL Lose that much Dexterity and Strength and respectively at the end of your turn.
entity:Anomaly.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X Dexterity and X Strength for each card played this turn after this. NL Lose that much Dexterity and Strength and respectively at the end of your turn.

entity:Avoid.NAME: Avoid
entity:Avoid.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !entity:S! void card into your discard pile.

entity:BoundlessAether.NAME: Boundless Aether
entity:BoundlessAether.DESCRIPTION: Gain !entity:A! Artifact. All enemies gain !entity:A! Artifact.
entity:BoundlessAether.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !entity:A! Artifact. Target enemy gains !entity:A! Artifact.

entity:Crucible.NAME: Crucible
entity:Crucible.DESCRIPTION: Apply !entity:F! entity:Flux to all enemies. NL Gain a *Void for each enemy. NL Exhaust.

entity:Delirium.NAME: Delirium
entity:Delirium.DESCRIPTION: Apply !entity:F! entity:Flux to all enemies. NL Gain !entity:E! entity:Essence. NL Exhaust.

entity:Disturb.NAME: Disturb
entity:Disturb.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !entity:S! Weak to yourself. Apply !M! Weak to target enemy.

entity:FluxCapacitor.NAME: Flux Capacitor
entity:FluxCapacitor.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain Block equal to the total entity:Flux on all creatures.

entity:FreneticFind.NAME: Frenetic Find
entity:FreneticFind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !entity:A! Artifact. NL gain a *Slimed, *Void, *Dazed, *Burn, and *Wound card into your discard pile.

entity:GreatOldOne.NAME: Great Old One
entity:GreatOldOne.DESCRIPTION: Play all cards in your Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

entity:Insanity.NAME: Insanity
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: , and add a Curse to your discard pile.

entity:JoinAsOne.NAME: Join As One
entity:JoinAsOne.DESCRIPTION: Gain !entity:S! entity:Flux. Apply !entity:F! entity:Flux to all enemies.

entity:Ka.NAME: Ka
entity:Ka.DESCRIPTION: Apply !entity:F! entity:Flux. If you have entity:Lu, entity:Chant entity:Lu.

entity:Lu.NAME: Lu
entity:Lu.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. If you have entity:Tu, entity:Chant entity:Tu.

entity:OddsAreSlim.NAME: Odds Are Slim
entity:OddsAreSlim.DESCRIPTION: Gain !entity:S! Vulnerable and !entity:S! Weak. NL Gain !entity:A! Artifact.

entity:Parry.NAME: Parry
entity:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack. Gain !B! Block.

entity:Ripple.NAME: Ripple
entity:Ripple.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !entity:F! entity:Flux. NL Draw a card.

entity:RipplingGrace.NAME: Rippling Grace
entity:RipplingGrace.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. For each card exhausted, draw a card, gain [E] , gain 1 Block and add a *Void into your discard pile. Exhaust.

entity:Rejuvenation.NAME: Rejuvenation
entity:Rejuvenation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !entity:E! entity:Essence. NL Exhaust.

entity:SlipThroughCracks.NAME: Slip Through Cracks
entity:SlipThroughCracks.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. Gain !M! intangible. NL Exhaust.

entity:Split.NAME: Split
entity:Split.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card and shuffle a copy into your draw pile.

entity:Surge.NAME: Surge
entity:Surge.DESCRIPTION: For each card played this turn, including this card, play and Exhaust the top card of your library. NL Exhaust.

entity:TaintedEyes.NAME: Tainted Eyes
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Exhaust a card at random.

entity:ToTheAbyss.NAME: To the Abyss
entity:ToTheAbyss.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. Draw that many cards and gain that much entity:Essence. NL Exhaust.

entity:Tu.NAME: Tu
entity:Tu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have entity:Ka, entity:Chant entity:Ka.

entity:VirulentPox.NAME: Virulent Pox
entity:VirulentPox.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy dies, apply all entity:Flux on that enemy to a random enemy.

entity:VoidPulse.NAME: Void Pulse
entity:VoidPulse.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a status is drawn, gain [E] and draw a card.
entity:VoidPulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a status is drawn, gain [E] and draw a card.

entity:VoidWeave.NAME: Void Weave
entity:VoidWeave.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a *Void, gain !B! Block.

entity:WarpedForm.NAME: Warped Form
entity:WarpedForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !entity:A! Artifact. At start of turn, apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself.
